document_data.name: Tlanaggathur
document_data.mainbody: '''Tlanaggathur''', who was simply nicknamed '''the Conjurer''', was a powerful but reclusive [[wizard]] inhabiting [[Tulmon]] along the [[Lake of Steam]] during the mid-to-late 14{{th}} century [[DR]].<ref name=EotSS-p166">
document_data.Activities: He spent most of his time secluded within his mansion, practicing the summoning and control of creatures from other places. He utilized the creatures as servants to perform special errands usually involving retrieving [[magic item]]s or rare [[material component]]s from across [[Faer√ªn]].<ref name=EotSS-p166"/>
document_data.Rumors & Legends: The gate of his large mansion was decorated with eight hands that were painted black. Locals whispered that they were remnants of other wizards who attempted to steal Tlanaggathur's magic.<ref name=EotSS-p166"/>
